evidence: You can design a circular symmetric arrangement of piezoelectric elements, like the one shown here.
With this type of array, you cannot do circular scanning-because it’s already circularly symmetric-but you can focus along the principal direction.
The advantage is that you can control the focal distance very easily.
You can make the focus point closer or farther, depending on the time delay and how you drive those circular rings.

triples.evidence: You can design a circular symmetric arrangement of piezoelectric elements, like the one shown here.

evidence: You can make the ultrasound beam radially symmetric, or what we sometimes call recirculately symmetric.
You can control the focal distance very easily.
You can make the focus point closer or farther, depending on the time delay and how you drive those circular rings.
That's something you can easily do with this annular array structure.
You can adjust the focal distance to be small or large. That's something you can easily do with this annular array structure.
triples.o: time delay and driving of circular rings
